properties.address: Canolfan Y Bont, 28 Dulais Road, , Pontarddulais, Swansea SA4 8PA
properties.description: We have a warm space within our community centre. We offer hot soup, cold and hot beverages, biscuits, toast. This is offered on a Monday throughout the Autumn/Winter months on a Monday between 1pm - 3pm. Come along for a chat, play board games, colouring, cards, computers are also available to use.
properties.title: Canolfan Y Bont (Canolfan Cwtch)

properties.address: Sketty Community Church, Swansea, West Glamorgan SA2 9BP
properties.description: Everyone knows what a Coffee Morning is? Well at ours, you can pop in for a T or C and some biscuits (or possibly a bacon roll!!) and then leave. Or you can stay for as long as you wish. There will be newspapers available for you. If you wish to be energetic you can play table tennis or snooker. You can play chess or Scrabble. Or, you can find a quiet corner and just sit and chill. The space is there for you to be comfortable. We also have plenty of folk on hand who would be happy to chat on any topic under the sun. This is why our Coffee Morning has a PLUS.
properties.title: Coffee Morning Plus

properties.address: Sketty Community Church, Swansea, West Glamorgan SA2 9BP
properties.description: Friendship Group does what it says on the tin! A chance to sit and chat over T&C and biscuits and make friends.
properties.title: Friendship Group

properties.description: We offer a free lunch, tea and coffee and a warm welcome on the third Tuesday of every month.
properties.title: Lunch Club

properties.address: New Community Pavilion , Swansea, Swansea SA6 5NS
properties.description: The space is open to all and has toilets , including disabled , baby change , phone charging , daily papers and more
properties.title: New Community Pavilion Coed Gwilym Park Clydach Swansea

properties.description: Swansea MAD is a grassroots, anti-poverty, anti-racist, pro-equality, pro-environmental, inclusive youth and community charity. We work for a fair world in which people can be themselves and thrive! Swansea MAD develops inclusive safe spaces for people to access advocacy, creative arts, education, digital access, employability support, training, campaigning activities and projects to bring fairness and belonging and to influence change for the better. Swansea MAD is part of the Swansea Spaces scheme as a local drop-in Warm Welcome hub, supporting and welcoming people to free food, hot drinks, toiletries, period products, charging points, SIM cards, digital devices and data (and training and support on how to use them). We also provide information and support about energy tariffs and efficiency and support people to register for the Priority Services Register. Swansea MAD also hosts food event every month, where everyone is welcome to share a hot meal and have a chat. Connect with us on our social media platforms to know the dates.
properties.title: Swansea MAD Warm Hub Drop-in

properties.description: The 104 offers a warm and welcoming community live, work space. The community building has been brought back into use following a full refurbishment and is now a comfortable, social place to relax and enjoy a free hot drink, use the free wi-fi and find out about local opportunities or support available.
properties.title: The 104
